title: The 1980s Comedy Movie Draft
description:
We are drafting again! And we’re widening the scope this time around. Sean, Amanda, and Chris Ryan pick their faves and foil their pals in a draft of 1980s comedy movies.

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guest: Chris Ryan
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
